title: Homemade coleslaw with apple
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon prepared English mustard', '1 teaspoon white wine vinegar', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon white pepper', '1/2 white cabbage, thinly sliced', '1 to 2 large carrots, grated', '1 medium eating apple, cored and grated', '1/2 red onion, thinly sliced']
